oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Newsprint page including Major General William T. Sherman's testimony on the conduct of the war
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This newspaper page was found amongst the belongings of Pvt. Michael Myrick, of Carthage, Hamilton County, Ohio who served in Co. G, 68th Ohio Vol. Inf., USA. It includes Maj. Gen. William T. Sherman's testimony on the conduct of the war, his negotiations with Gen. Johnston, his official report of the North Carolina campaign, his visit to Savannah, Ga., correspondence with Generals Stanton, Halleck and Grant. Col. John Eaton's report on the care of former slaves from Memphis is also included.
